data.Title: Google Discover Offers No Content Blocking Options
data.Description: Google confirms no option to block content from Discover, unlike News, highlighting limitations in crawling control.

data.Title: Google's Handling of Publisher Concerns Raises Questions
data.Description: Google inadvertently reveals reasons that explain their seeming indifference to publishers hurt by algorithm updates

data.Title: Google Emphasizes Full Page Rendering for Search
data.Description: Google renders all webpages, including JavaScript-heavy sites, for search indexing.

data.Title: Experts Debate the Role of Humans in Content Creation Amidst AI Rise
data.Description: Richard George takes on the debate about the role of humans in content creation.

data.Title: The Importance of Backlinking in the Age of AI
data.Description: The onslaught of artificial intelligence has wreaked havoc on the way content is created and perceived. Optimizing for search engines has undergone many changes but one of the factors that remain critical to optimization is backlinking. SERP ratings are highly impacted by backlinks as per 58.1% SEOs. With quality link building, this is achievable.

data.Title: Google's Disavow Tool: Is It Still Relevant in 2024?
data.Description: There's one possible reason to disavow inbound links in circa 2024.

data.Title: Schema.org Unveils a Fresh New Look
data.Description: Schema.org has a new design, it seems like the design went live this week. The Schema.org validator also looks fresh and new. It is unclear if there were any other changes made, outside of the design update.

data.Title: Google Experiments with AI-Generated Content Labels
data.Description: @aleyda: 🧵 I can't believe I am about to write this but... the Bing index is crucial in the future of SEO. Why? It's not about Bing the search engine. Bing's index now also powers ChatGPT (and thus, soon Apple's Siri), Meta AI, LinkedIn AI and Microsoft Copilot.

data.Title: Google Search Testing New Features: AI Overview Button, Highlighted Words, and Background Colors
data.Description: Google Search tests back to AI Overview button - after you scroll past the AI Overview, Google really wants you to go back to it

data.Title: OpenAI Develops 'Strawberry' Project to Enhance AI Reasoning Abilities
data.Description: "Navigate the internet autonomously and reliably to perform deep research" -> OpenAI is working on a project code named 'Strawberry', formerly known as Q*, which aims to improve AI model reasoning capabilities "The document describes a project that uses Strawberry models with

data.Title: New Senate Bill Aims to Protect Artists and Journalists from AI Content Use
data.Description: COPIED Act -> New Senate bill seeks to protect artists’ and journalists’ content from AI use. Stands for "Content Origin Protection and Integrity from Edited and Deepfaked Media Act" "The bill is designed to give content owners, such as journalists, newspapers, artists,

data.Title: Google Business Profiles Chat Feature Discontinued
data.Description: Google Business Profiles chat feature no longer lets you start new chats - make sure to download your chat history.

data.Title: Google to Increase Engagement with Content Creators
data.Description: Brandon Saltalamacchia, the founder of Retro Dodo, covered his meeting he had with Danny Sullivan at Google - he covered it under the title A Brief Meeting With Google After The Apocalypse. Danny Sullivan said later that this was the second time he recently had such a meeting and he is working on setting up the third one soon.
